text.0: active and bright have they come forth impetuous in speed like bulls.
text.1: driving the black skin far away.
text.2: quelling the riteless dasyu may we think upon the bridge of bliss.
text.3: leaving the bridge of woe behind.
text.4: the mighty pavamanas roar is heard as twere the rush of rain.
text.5: lightnings are flashing to the sky.
text.6: pour out on us abundant food when thou art pressed o indu wealth.
text.7: in kine and gold and steeds and spoil.
text.8: flow on thy way most active thou fill full the mighty heavens and earth.
text.9: as dawn as sūrya with his beams.
text.10: on every side o soma flow round us with thy protecting stream.
text.11: as rasā flows around the world.
